title: No visuals in Champ Select
body: 2 Games back to back have showed no visuals after you accept the game and it moves to champ select which has now given me a 30 min que ban because i cant select my champion i dont think i should be being penalized for a bug in the client please get back to me as soon as you can thank you

replies.body:
This is a [**known issue**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-hot-issue-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client) with the Beta Client that only affects the transition between the match invite and champ select. Some players have reported that collapsing their friends list groups **prior** to queueing up for a Match serves as a quick workaround. I'd like you to try it and let me know if it works for you too:

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/GJulP
